NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PHLOX: Papa, the jellyfish came to the surface again today! 2 1 PLUME: What?! This consistency is unprecedented.. Did they not visit the surface yesterday as well? 3 2 PLUME: Has this phenomenon become more frequent? Or are we simply observing it consistently now with the help of the specimen we transported from Bramble Island? When our friends return, I must ponder this with them at once! 4 3 PLUME: An update: It has been some time, yet the jellyfish still remain on the planet's surface... This is truly peculiar. 5 4 PLUME: We have never observed them staying on the surface for such durations before. What could possibly be causing this change in their behavior? 6 3 PHLOX: Where have Thatch, Melorae and Coleus gone, papa? 7 6 PLUME: They set off this morning for a new expedition, Phlox. Thank goodness we stayed behind to see this exciting phenomenon - but what a shame for it to only occur now in their absence! LC EX4 7 Study R3 7
